experiences.title: Frontend Engineer
experiences.description:
- Developed and deployed full-stack AI projects using ChatGPT services, Typescript and Next.js, taking full responsibility from development to deployment. Conducted code reviews, resource and server meetings, and contributed to a full-stack AI translation project integrated with CrownPeak, utilizing Hono, React, Redis, and PostgreSQL.
- Maintained and optimized an internal Vue2 project by integrating Vite, updating dependencies, and improving code quality and performance. Also maintained the HubSpot CMS project used by the NMQ website.
- Worked as a Frontend Engineer on 4 CrownPeak CMS projects, developing and maintaining over 100 complex CMS components. Conducted R&D and POCs on cutting-edge technologies and frameworks to improve productivity in legacy full-stack CMS systems, including asset injection based on components, Lit usage, and headless CrownPeak.
- Provided project estimations, guided newcomers during onboarding, and conducted research on new technologies for customers.

experiences.title: Frontend Engineer
experiences.description: - Migrated website to Vue.js and Bootstrap, introducing new architecture and improving performance. - Integrated marketing and observation tools seamlessly, optimizing performance while maintaining functionality. - Achieved significant performance improvements with a 60 to 90+ score increase in Lighthouse reports and enhanced SEO. - Led development of parent and student applications, ensuring consistency with website architecture. - Implemented Sentry for error monitoring, reducing bugs and errors by 83% and enhancing user experience.

experiences.title: Frontend Engineer
experiences.description:
- Made contributions Vivense e-commerce websites and internal ERP project written with Vue.js.
- Mostly worked on Basket, Checkout, Accounting, Order and Customer services.
- Gained experience about working with different professions that related to software development process and being part of distributed systems.
- Lastly became familiar with remote work, agile methodologies, responsive design and UX best practices.

experiences.title: Frontend Engineer
experiences.description:
- Developed reybex Mobile, reybex Hand Terminal, reybex B2B Shop projects from the ground up. Also made contributions to main project reybex. Besides responsible for reybex Sales Person mobile app.
- Used javascript frameworks like Nuxt.js, Vue.js, React-Native, Feathers.js, Socket.io.
- As a summary of reybex adventure, developed three projects on the ground up and contributed other reybex projects. Reviewed almost 250 MR's and made about 2.5k contributions to all of reybex internal projects in one year.

experiences.title: Fullstack Intern
experiences.company: BGS Bireysel Gelişim İnteraktif Sis. A.Ş
experiences.description:
- Worked on the main project named EYSIS. This project based on Phalcon PHP Framework, MySQL database on the backend side and Vue, Vuetify on the client side.
- Integrated all active development process into Docker. Besides that, worked on Linux computers, gained experience on git.
